document_notes.text:
This update for frr fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2022-37032: Fixed out-of-bounds read in the BGP daemon that may lead to information disclosure or denial of service (bsc#1202023).
- CVE-2019-25074: Fixed a memory leak in the IS-IS daemon that may lead to server memory exhaustion (bsc#1202022).
document_notes.title: Details

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: An out-of-bounds read in the BGP daemon of FRRouting FRR before 8.4 may lead to a segmentation fault and denial of service. This occurs in bgp_capability_msg_parse in bgpd/bgp_packet.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
